file_insights.changes: Extracted type definitions from file, replaced with imports from types.ts
Added comprehensive type definitions with detailed documentation

patterns_discovered: Type Extraction: Moving local interface definitions to a centralized types file
Modular Type Organization: Grouping related types with clear section comments
Type Documentation: Adding descriptive comments for each type interface
Re-export Pattern: Re-exporting types for convenient importing
gotchas_discovered: Previously type definitions were scattered across the component file
No centralized location for tracking component prop types
Lack of type documentation made understanding interfaces difficult
recommendations: Continue extracting type definitions to dedicated type files
Add comprehensive JSDoc comments for all type interfaces
Consider using a consistent naming convention for prop interfaces
Maintain a clear grouping strategy in type files (e.g., core types, component props)
